/data/opt/brew/bin/ccache /data/opt/brew/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -fopenmp   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/bug.dir/src/apps/bug.cpp.o  -o bug -lpthread -lboost_system-mt -lboost_filesystem-mt -lboost_regex-mt -lboost_thread-mt -lboost_program_options-mt -lboost_date_time-mt -lboost_chrono-mt -lboost_atomic-mt -lmpi src/include/kahiplib/liblibkaffpa.a src/include/kahiplib/liblibmapping.a -lgomp -lpthread
